metadata.feature_description: Navigation controls for paginated data in tag statistics and popular content

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test with single page of data (empty data state)

steps.expected: Community Analytics page loads with all module tabs visible
steps.actual: Community Analytics page loaded successfully showing all 6 module tabs (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki)

steps.action: View Trending Tags and Popular Content sections
steps.expected: Sections display with appropriate empty state message when no data exists
steps.actual: Both sections display 'No trending tags available in selected period' and 'No popular content available in selected period' messages. No pagination controls are visible, which is correct behavior when there is no data to paginate

steps.action: Switch time period to Year to check for historical data
steps.expected: System updates to show yearly data range
steps.actual: Time period changed to year (28 Feb 2025 - 27 Feb 2026). Trending Tags and Popular Content sections still show empty state messages. No pagination controls visible, confirming no historical data exists to paginate

steps.action: Attempt to locate pagination next/previous controls
steps.expected: Pagination controls visible when data exists
steps.actual: No pagination controls are present in the UI. The Trending Tags and Popular Content sections show empty state messages with no data to paginate

issues: Cannot test next/previous navigation: No tag or content data exists in the system. Pagination controls only appear when there is enough data to require multiple pages

steps.action: Attempt to locate page jump controls
steps.expected: Page number indicators or jump controls visible when data exists
steps.actual: No page jump controls are present in the UI. Both Trending Tags and Popular Content sections are empty with no data

issues: Cannot test page jump functionality: No tag or content data exists in the system to generate multiple pages

steps.action: Attempt to locate current page indicator
steps.expected: Current page indicator visible when data exists
steps.actual: No current page indicator is present in the UI. Pagination controls are not rendered when there is no data

issues: Cannot validate current page indicator: No tag or content data exists in the system. Page indicators only appear with paginated data

observations: The code repository (Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Engage) was empty, preventing code review to understand the exact implementation of pagination controls
The Community Analytics dashboard correctly displays empty states for Trending Tags and Popular Content sections when no data exists
Pagination controls are conditionally rendered - they only appear when there is enough data to require multiple pages
All 6 module tabs (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) were checked across both weekly and yearly time periods with consistent empty state results
The empty state behavior is appropriate - showing 'No trending tags available in selected period' and 'No popular content available in selected period' rather than broken pagination controls
To fully test pagination functionality, test data (community content with tags, viewed content) would need to be created to populate these sections
